newsitem.title: USA: Medtronic shrs surge after company comment.
newsitem.headline: Medtronic shrs surge after company comment.

text.p: Shares of Medtronic Inc surged on Thursday after the company said its pacemaker business was doing well and it was aiming for 15 percent compound annual growth in earnings and revenue.
A spokesman for Medtronic said the company held a conference call with analysts on Thursday to address issues that it felt were holding back its stock price.
Medtronic stock climbed 5-1/8 to 63-1/4 in late afternoon trade. About 2.27 million shares changed hands, compared with a daily average of about 1.11 million.
